value.title: Hustle Fund Events
value.description:
About Event
​Let's hang!

​Let’s hang in SF.

​Fundraising is hard enough. Cross-border fundraising can feel impossible. You pitch, you follow up, and sometimes you never hear back, or you get a “no” with zero context. That doesn’t help anyone.

​So we’re doing something different.

​Hustle Fund x H-OnDream are hosting a special Batter Up pitch event featuring founders from Korea pitching to a US investor audience, with real questions, real feedback, and time to actually connect after.

​This is
